roleset.name: mode of motion
roleset.note: TRAIPSE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls run-51.3.2. (from traipse.01-v)

example.name: the one example
example.text: So it seems that Mr. Mitsotakis and his communist chums may have unwittingly served Mr. Papandreou a moral victory on a platter: PASOK, whether guilty or not, can now traipse the countryside condemning the whole affair as a witch hunt at Mr. Papandreou's expense.
example.arg: condemning the whole affair as a witch hunt at Mr. Papandreou's expense
